rows.label: qst202016_msg0002
rows.name:
From my father? Thank you for 
going to all this trouble.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0011
rows.name:
These golden bracers... 
I remember hearing about them when I was little.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0003
rows.name:
I wonder if Dad and Musubi are still the same as ever?
 I haven't seen them for quite a while.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0004
rows.name: I wonder if Musubi is still making omusubi like she used to?

rows.label: qst202016_msg0005
rows.name:
Both my sister and I loved the omusubi 
Musubi made for us.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0006
rows.name:
I'll bring my family to visit them sometime. 
I'd like to see Musubi too.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0008
rows.name:
Could you pass this onto Daddy
for me? 
It's an accessory. I made it myself.

rows.label: qst202016_msg0009
rows.name:
He probably won't use it, 
but it's proof that we're doing well over here.

rows.label: qst202016_msg101
rows.name:
Musubi was like a mother to us. 
She's been by our side for as long as we can remember.

rows.label: qst202016_msg102
rows.name: She's such an important person to us.

rows.label: qst202016_msg103
rows.name: Ah, I'd love to eat Musubi's omusubi again...
